info.brief_description: Another story about Age Change and Fanfiction that anyone can add to.
info.description:
You are all familiar with this http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1649590-Pampered-Tales-of-the-Unkno... by this http://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/fivefooteight ? Well here is another collection of Stories about Age regression. Every one is allowed to add to this story arc as long as they follow the rules;

Rules:
No Swearing
no insulting any religon
no killing charecters (only I can do that)
no replacing charecters (you can add new ones though)
keep in the age limit
no drug use or refrence

Also although physical age regression is allowed mental is contriversal as long as you make it clear if its perminet or temporary How ever forced is optional.

Like the original:

There are three classes of regression:
Physical
Mental
Forced
